targets.expr:
sum(increase(bee_localstore_method_calls_duration_sum{instance=~"$instance", namespace=~"$namespace", component="reserve"}[5m])) by (method)
/
sum(increase(bee_localstore_method_calls_duration_count{instance=~"$instance", namespace=~"$namespace", component="reserve"}[5m])) by (method)

sum(bee_localstore_method_calls{instance=~"$instance", namespace=~"$namespace", component="reserve", status="failure"}) by (method) / sum(bee_localstore_method_calls{instance=~"$instance", namespace=~"$namespace", component="reserve"}) by (method)
